DataSourcePortable.Name: Ordens Produção Status
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT COUNT(*) AS QUANTIDADE ,STATUS FROM PR_ORDENSPRODUCAO A
WHERE (A.EMPRESA = @EMPRESA ) AND (A.FILIAL = @FILIAL)
GROUP BY A.STATUS" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="QUANTIDADE" From="A" Path="QUANTIDADE" /> <Field Alias="STATUS" From="A" Path="STATUS" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
